body_html: Oh the author definitely needs to take a look if ONNX expects are changing for no apparent reason. I only meant that I'm getting an email for every PR because I'm reviewing a lot of them. When I see PRs (from others) that only touch ONNX related parts then I often skip those, because I'm often not 100% up to date with ONNX discussions. I'm not the only person following this workflow, and it really makes life a lot easier for us.

body: Oh the author definitely needs to take a look if ONNX expects are changing for no apparent reason. I only meant that I'm getting an email for every PR because I'm reviewing a lot of them. When I see PRs (from others) that only touch ONNX related parts then I often skip those, because I'm often not 100% up to date with ONNX discussions. I'm not the only person following this workflow, and it really makes life a lot easier for us.
